thread.title: Topless women of Times Square say they can’t be restricted
thread.title_full: Topless women of Times Square say they can’t be restricted

author: wtopstaff
title: Topless women of Times Square say they can’t be restricted
text:
Home » News » Entertainment » Topless women of Times… Topless women of Times Square say they can’t be restricted By VERENA DOBNIK October 11, 2015 12:59 pm FILE - In this July 28, 2015, file photo, a tourist poses for a photo with two women clad in thongs and body paint in New York's Times Square. Topless women posing for photos in Times Square are causing headaches for politicians and law enforcement who wish to regulate their presence but have no clear idea how. (AP Photo/Julie Jacobson, File) 
NEW YORK (AP) — Facing a cringe-worthy crisis after decades of polishing up Times Square’s image, some city officials are proposing roped-off areas for the painted ladies and costumed characters who seek tips to pose for tourist photos. 
But several of the topless, body-painted women who spoke candidly with The Associated Press this past week made it clear that, restrictions or not, they’re not going anywhere. 
Twenty-nine-year-old Saira Nicole says she’d defy any move to restrict the women to a specific zone. As she put it, “You’re not putting a stop to me, period.” 
But City Councilman Corey Johnson says the city must ease pedestrian crowding by setting some restrictions. He’s a member of a hastily convened city task force that has proposed the “activity zones.” Topics:
